author: jsmanifest

comments.comment: Fat arrow functions are called a 'function expression'.
You can simply use open close symbol of elements as a fragment, over React.Fragment within the symbols. Slightly cleaner.

description: List of tips for creating clean code.

quotes.quote: 1. Destructure Your Props; ...It doesn’t force developers to read through the implementation of the component to find out all the props that are tied to the component.
8. Componentize Duplicate Elements; ...converting duplicate elements to their reusable component. ...your teammate might get criticized about the duplicate code when they didn’t even write it.
9. Keep Your Components Simple; ...[don't] keep components simple, but to avoid making your components complicated.

title: 14 Beneficial Tips to Write Cleaner Code in React Apps
